tool.name: Fastp Long Read Filter
tool.command: fastplong -i '$inputs' -o '$output' #if $reads_to_process: --reads_to_process '$reads_to_process' #end if #if $disable_quality_filtering: --disable_quality_filtering #end if #if $disable_adapter_trimming: --disable_adapter_trimming #end if #if $start_adapter: --start_adapter '$start_adapter' #end if #if $end_adapter: --end_adapter '$end_adapter' #end if #if $adapter_fasta: --adapter_fasta '$adapter_fasta' #end if #if $distance_threshold: --distance_threshold '$distance_threshold' #end if #if $trimming_extension: --trimming_extension '$trimming_extension' #end if #if $trim_front: --trim_front '$trim_front' #end if #if $trim_tail: --trim_tail '$trim_tail' #end if

param.name: reads_to_process
param.label: Number of reads to process (optional)
param.help: Limit the number of reads to process. Useful for quick QC or creating subsets.

param.name: disable_quality_filtering
param.label: Disable quality filtering?
param.help: By default, quality filtering is enabled. Enable this option to turn it off (--disable_quality_filtering or -Q).

param.name: disable_adapter_trimming
param.label: Disable adapter trimming?
param.help: By default, adapter trimming is enabled. Enable this option to turn it off (--disable_adapter_trimming or -A).

param.name: start_adapter
param.label: Start adapter sequence (5')
param.help: Specify the adapter sequence at the 5' end of reads (--start_adapter or -s). Leave blank to auto-detect.

param.name: end_adapter
param.label: End adapter sequence (3')
param.help: Specify the adapter sequence at the 3' end of reads (--end_adapter or -e). Leave blank to auto-detect.

param.name: adapter_fasta
param.label: Adapter sequences (FASTA file)
param.help: Specify a FASTA file with adapter sequences to trim (--adapter_fasta or -a)

param.name: distance_threshold
param.label: Adapter distance threshold
param.help: Threshold of sequence-adapter-distance / adapter-length. Higher values detect more adapters (--distance_threshold or -d). Range: 0.0â€“1.0

param.name: trimming_extension
param.label: Trimming extension length
param.help: Extend trimming beyond the adapter match to clean up the sequence more thoroughly (--trimming_extension). Default is 10

param.name: trim_front
param.label: Trim front (5') bases
param.help: Trim this many bases from the start (5') of each read (--trim_front or -f). Default is 0

param.name: trim_tail
param.label: Trim tail (3') bases
param.help: Trim this many bases from the end (3') of each read (--trim_tail or -t). Default is 0
